modShortDescription: Changes the movement factor for certain materials (snow, sand, desert) to walk slower on them. Default is 10% slower on all 3 than vanilla.
modDescription:
Changes the movement factor for certain materials (snow, sand, desert) to walk slower on them.

* Default is 10% slower on all 3 than vanilla.
* Decreases walking speed on snow, desert and sand.
* Adds realism to the substrate you are walking on without using any additional stamina.
* Can be adjusted in the xml file easily to suit your needs.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Su1C1daL/Su1C1dal-7DTD-Mods/tree/master/Su1C1dal%207DTD%20Walk%20Slower)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19055-su1c1dal-modlets/).
